app.title: Poe - Fast AI Chat
app.description:
Poe brings together the best AI, all in one place. It is designed for seamless conversational experiences, enhanced productivity, and creative content generation.

Key Features: 
- Fast and reliable access to the latest AI models
- Cross-device compatibility
- State-of-the-art multimedia generation
- Combine and compare models in a single chat
- Advanced tools to create customized chatbots

Best-in-Class AI Models, All in One Place

Poe incorporates powerful AI models like OpenAI's o3 and GPT-4.5, Anthropic's Claude 3.7 Sonnet, Google's Gemini 2.0, and multimedia generators from Runway, ElevenLabs, and many more. Experience the cutting edge of AI technology, all in one app.

Chat with multiple bots at once

Compare responses from leading AI models and seamlessly combine any bots for any use case - all within a single chat thread.

AI-Powered Search Engine

Get highly relevant results powered by advanced natural language processing and web search technology to find what you need faster.

Create Stunning Images and Videos Instantly

Transform your ideas into eye-catching images or videos with state-of-the-art generators like FLUX1.1, Ideogram 2.0, Stable Diffusion 3.5, Veo 2, Runway, Hailuo, Dream Machine, and more. 

Talk to Custom Bots & AI Personalities

With access to an ever-growing ecosystem of over 1 million custom bots, you can learn a new language or any topic, chat directly with uploaded files like PDFs and images, search the web for the latest world news, or even have natural conversations with recreations of your favorite characters. 

Build & Share Your Own AI Bots

Create your own custom chatbots to generate study plans, curate Spotify playlists, run Python code, and do anything else you can imagine in less than a minute. You can also add custom knowledge bases to deliver more unique experience for users. Have your AI chatbots instantly shared with millions of Poe users!

Poe delivers a seamless AI experience via a user-friendly interface. Download Poe now and step into the future of AI. 

By using Poe, you confirm that you have read, acknowledged, and agreed to our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

Privacy Policy: https://poe.com/privacy

Terms of Service: https://poe.com/tos

app.summary: Access advanced AI like GPT-4.1, Claude 3.7, DeepSeek-R1 and more.

reviews.text: It's a very great app all in all with few bugs, the characters act as if you are actually talking to the real character and roleplaying with them. The only bug is when it's not quick enough to load it freezes but I just solve that by exiting the app and removing it from the most recent apps before going back on it. The bots remember everything about the roleplay stories

Startpage messy = Favorite bots launchpad (not always starting a new chat). It would be great to be able to write instructions for suggested replies. UPDATE: The new [Thinking] window is super annoying. please just collapse it - it isn't that hard.
reviews.replyText: Thank you for using Poe and sharing your feedback!

reviews.text: The new subscription model is outright inferior to the previous. Now, you have a fixed number of messages, even with a PAID subscription. Before if you went over your sub limit, the messages might temporarily become unavailable or slow down when the system was overloaded. Now, with the new "compute points," you have a set limit regardless if you're a paid or free user. I'm definitely not renewing my subscription. Will be porting my bots to a competitor once my sub runs out this month.

It's not entirely the worst. It's kind of like character ai (just without a filter), but it has a few bugs. One bug is that the bot seems to copy and paste the same thing over and over again. Also, it forgets who is who and plays as me. Prompts sometimes fix this, but it isn't a good source. Also, the homepage is kinda painful to navigate through.

It's a good app, I've been using it for a few months but I've noticed issues. The search bar doesn't really work properly, which is kinda annoying. The cool down for the messaging is kind of unfair and long depending on when you start using the app, and refreshing messages counts towards you overall message count which is frustrating. It would also be nice to be able to edit messages since some messages are really good, but just a little off. If these get fixed I'll give a better rating.

I really loved this app, like there was so many great things about it. I've recommended it to tons of people, but now with the new updates it's just going downhill. People love your app for multiple reasons and those reasons are being ruined by the filter, as well as the limit. Sure 100 seems a lot but I use the assistant for multiple things, writing characters, stories, etc. And when I'm not, I'm using it to roleplay, the limit as well filter has ruined the fun in this app.

It is good, let me start off with that. But the reason I am giving it three stars is the lack of being able to edit responses as well as both you and the bots using YOUR free messages to do so. This issue becomes blaringly obvious when, inevitably, the bot gets stuck replying as your character and won't re-take their role. You're forced to continue re-running responses with little chance of success. That and it's annoying how the bots continue to repeat themselves. Please add the option to edit.

Good at first, at first it was unlimited and it was really good. Memory is pretty good. Then it became limited. 100 messages a day, which was annoying but it was okay. But now it's gone to points and I only get 15 messages a day. The price for premium isn't really worth it either as it wouldn't become unlimited, I would just have more "points" Edit 1. They eventually gave you more points for awhile, around 3000, and that was still a bit steep, I could manage. But it's right back to 15 messages.

The AI learns quickly and has an excellent memory. Only two issues so far: (1) sometimes the AI roleplays as the player character, which can be jarring, and (2) most responses seem quite long-winded and push to end the scene quickly, which hurts my feelings LOL. Anyway, great app, will use again. Edited: Wow! I take it back! The AI has gotten so much lazier! It forgets things instantly and instead of writing an original response, it just rephrases the messages I just sent. I miss the old AI üò≠

This is one of the best and most useful AI apps out. I do a lot of experimenting with AI apps, and this one has everything. You can create your own personal bot for your interests. It does need to have more free usage than its original but still enough to get information you're wanting within reason. Good job with this app. I do reviews for new apps and other things, and this one is one of my favorite go-to, for answers.

app.developerLegalAddress: 605 Castro St, Mountain View, CA 94041, United States
app.AIReview:
Overview

Poe ‚Äì Fast AI Chat has rapidly ascended to become one of the most popular apps leveraging large language models (LLMs) currently available. With over 8.7 million installs and a robust 4.61-star rating, Poe‚Äôs success stems from its ambitious goal: to consolidate access to some of the industry's leading AI chatbots within a single, user-friendly interface. The app promises seamless conversational experiences, boosted productivity, and creative content generation‚Äîclaims that, based on initial testing, hold considerable weight. It operates on a free model, relying on in-app advertising for revenue, a strategy common among apps offering access to premium AI services. This review will delve into the core functionality of Poe, examining its strengths, weaknesses, and overall value proposition for users seeking to harness the power of artificial intelligence.

Key Features

Poe‚Äôs feature set is undeniably impressive, reflecting the significant investment in integrating a diverse range of cutting-edge LLMs. The primary features include:

  • Access to Multiple AI Models: Poe boasts integration with prominent models like OpenAI‚Äôs o3 and GPT-4, alongside Claude 3.7, DeepSeek-R1, and others. This allows users to seamlessly switch between different AI personalities and capabilities without the hassle of managing multiple accounts or applications.
  • Cross-Device Compatibility: The app is designed for a consistent experience across iOS and Android devices, ensuring accessibility regardless of the user's preferred platform. This is crucial in an environment where users often need quick access to AI assistance while on the go.
  • Multimedia Generation Tools: Beyond text generation, Poe offers advanced tools for creating images and other multimedia content using AI. This expands its utility beyond simple question-answering or brainstorming.
  • Chat Combination & Comparison: A particularly clever feature allows users to simultaneously engage with multiple models within a single chat window. Users can compare their responses and refine prompts in real-time ‚Äì a powerful tool for critical analysis and decision-making.
  • Customizable Chatbot Creation: Poe provides tools for creating customized chatbots tailored to specific needs, allowing users to train AI models on particular datasets or instructions.

Strengths

One of Poe‚Äôs most significant strengths is its sheer breadth of model accessibility. The ability to instantly switch between GPT-4, Claude 3.7, and other powerful LLMs dramatically increases the app's versatility. The performance of these models within Poe appears generally consistent, demonstrating a well-optimized integration. Furthermore, the multimedia generation tools are surprisingly effective, producing reasonably detailed images from text prompts ‚Äì particularly impressive for a free application. The cross-device compatibility ensures accessibility across all user devices. Finally, the intuitive interface contributes to a positive initial user experience, making complex AI technology approachable for newcomers.

Areas for Improvement

Despite its strengths, Poe isn‚Äôt without areas needing attention. The reliance on in-app advertising can be disruptive and detracts from the conversational flow, especially during longer interactions. While the free tier is generous, limitations on prompt usage per day are noticeable and may frustrate power users seeking to maximize their AI exploration. The current moderation system appears somewhat reactive; instances of inappropriate responses (common with rapidly evolving LLMs) haven't been consistently addressed proactively. Finally, while the documentation for creating customized chatbots is present, it could benefit from more detailed tutorials and examples.

User Experience

The user interface of Poe is remarkably clean and intuitive. Navigation is straightforward, allowing users to quickly access different AI models and features. The chat window design is optimized for readability and ease of use, with clearly defined prompts and responses. The transition between models within a single conversation feels fluid and natural ‚Äì a testament to the app's development team‚Äôs attention to detail. However, the visual presentation could benefit from subtle enhancements; a slightly more polished aesthetic would elevate the overall experience. The responsiveness of the app is generally excellent across both iOS and Android devices, though occasional minor lag has been observed during complex multimedia generation tasks.

Value for Money

Poe's value proposition is primarily driven by its free access to powerful AI models. This democratizes access to cutting-edge technology that would otherwise require subscriptions to individual platforms. The advertising-supported model effectively provides a cost-free entry point for users interested in exploring the capabilities of LLMs. While a premium subscription offering unlimited prompts and advanced features could certainly enhance the value, the current free tier offers sufficient functionality for casual users and those seeking introductory AI experiences.

Conclusion

Poe ‚Äì Fast AI Chat represents a significant achievement in consolidating access to leading AI models into a single, accessible application. Its impressive feature set, intuitive user interface, and consistent performance make it a compelling choice for anyone interested in exploring the potential of artificial intelligence. While the advertising-supported model presents minor drawbacks, and further refinements could enhance its capabilities, Poe‚Äôs current value proposition ‚Äì free access to powerful AI ‚Äì is undeniably strong. With continued development and refinement, Poe has the potential to become the go-to app for anyone seeking a seamless and productive AI experience. Its 4.61 rating reflects this positive sentiment, and it's an app well worth exploring.
